name: Colorful Memories
description:
Colorful Memories has been made for the Ludum Dare 47 with the theme: Stuck in a loop. @Ayxs did the programming and story & @Bredera made the models, shaders, storyline and post processing. 

Story
In Colorful Memories the world around you has lost all its appeal. Something terrible has happened to your child which resulted in you being down and depressed. In this endless colorless world You walk around thinking about the pas and finding memories of days gone. 
reliving these memories gives you strength to carry on and these memories slowly bring color back to the world around you. 

Objective
You come across 6 memories in total which will give you an insight into the lives of our characters. 
Each memory will bring back a couple of colors to the world. 
At the end of the journey you can walk around an endless colorfull world!

Controls
- WASD: Walk around
- Mouse: Look around (you know how an FPS game works)
- E: Interact
- Esc: Exit the game at any time.
- Page Up/Page Down: Change mouse sensitivity (Up is up, down is down)

Changelog:

V1.0.1 (Bug Fixes)

  • Fixed a bug where some subtitles would fall of the screen.
  • Fixed a bug where shadows wouldn’t work correctly on some models.
  • Fixed a bug where the player could fall through the world (At least, I think so… This is a tough one to reproduce )

We really hope that you enjoy this experience.

Ayxs & Bredera
